item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, March 24, 2025 at 3:00 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Utah’s Republican voters fume over Doge cuts
2. [Opinion] My date used AI to psychologically profile me. Is that OK?
3. Is KKR’s bad bet on cycling the start of Europe’s private equity reckoning?
4. Trump’s policies shatter Wall Street’s ‘US exceptionalism’ trade
5. Mark Carney calls snap election for Canada citing ‘crisis’ caused by Trump
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, March 24, 2025 at 3:00 AM UTC
